snippet: John Nielsen-Gammon helps the public and policy makers understand issues like how the Texas climate is changing and how long the drought will last.
lead_paragraph: John Nielsen-Gammon helps the public and policy makers understand issues like how the Texas climate is changing and how long the drought will last.

headline.seo: State Climatologist Can Explain Why Texans Won’t Need Umbrellas
headline.main: An Eye on the Sky for Texas
